---
title: "Statistical Analysis in HTS"
author: "Joseph Walker"
date: "March 12, 2018"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)

data <- read.csv("st4controlstraindata.csv")

sort(names(data))

subset <- data %>% select(assay, assay_plate_label, plate_group_label, y_number, well_position, raw_assay_value, assay_value, median_background_signal, ap_dilution_factor, reference_dilution_factor)

subset <- subset %>% filter(!str_detect(string = plate_group_label,pattern = "M-*"))
```

Histogram

```{r histogram}
ggplot(subset, aes(x = assay_value)) +
  geom_density(aes(fill = y_number)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..),
                 color = "black",
                 fill = "white",
                 alpha = 0.2
                 ) +
  
  facet_wrap(~y_number, scales = "free")

ggplot(subset, aes(x = assay_value, group = y_number, fill = y_number)) +
  geom_density()
```


```{r scatterplot}

ggplot(subset, aes (x =  y_number, y = assay_value)) +
  geom_jitter()



```
